snippet: Wednesday’s highlights from around the Web include details on Google’s efforts to stop us from getting old. Plus, an attempt to piece together the life of the purported libertarian mastermind behind Silk Road, an online drug market.
abstract: Wednesday’s highlights from around the Web include details on Google’s efforts to stop us from getting old. Plus, an attempt to piece together the life of the purported libertarian mastermind behind Silk Road, an online drug market.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Google's Anti-Aging Start-Up, and the Man Tied to Silk Road
